title: Grab the TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra for Half the Price!
description: The TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra comes with Wear OS, in addition to pretty good battery life. The post Grab the TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra for Half the Price! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: The TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra comes with Wear OS, in addition to pretty good battery life.
text: If you’re after a Wear OS smartwatch with a rugged design, then you might want to check out the Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra – while it initially launched at a considerably high price, the device is now down to $150, making it cheaper than wearables like the Pixel Watch 2 and Fitbit Sense 2. The TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra does pack some nifty features, in addition to pretty good battery life. As for what you can expect in terms of hardware, the TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra comes with a rugged design, and is powered by Google’s Wear OS platform. The watch also comes with 100+ professional sports modes, with built-in GPS, speaker and microphone, in addition to the usual array of health-tracking features. The watch also comes with pretty impressive battery life, which Mobvoi says can last up to 72 hours on standby and up to 45 days in Essential mode. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. html:
If you’re after a Wear OS smartwatch with a rugged design, then you might want to check out the Mobvoi TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra – while it initially launched at a considerably high price, the device is now down to $150, making it cheaper than wearables like the Pixel Watch 2 and Fitbit Sense 2. The TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra does pack some nifty features, in addition to pretty good battery life.

As for what you can expect in terms of hardware, the TicWatch Pro 3 Ultra comes with a rugged design, and is powered by Google’s Wear OS platform. The watch also comes with 100+ professional sports modes, with built-in GPS, speaker and microphone, in addition to the usual array of health-tracking features. The watch also comes with pretty impressive battery life, which Mobvoi says can last up to 72 hours on standby and up to 45 days in Essential mode.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
